item.title: Challenging the Testing Pyramid
item.description: Writing automated tests has become like a standard practice in software development and (should be) an integral part of a healthy software development process. Testing (in particular automated testing) can come with different flavors and at different levels. In this article I’d like to provide a quick overview of automated UI or end-2-end testing with Cypress.
